CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
difficult to hear M and C due to buzzing in the tape

u.a: C takes pitcher and sets it on table
M pretends to pour from teapot
C takes teapot; M and C manipulate dishes
M pushes table out so they can sit down; pulls it back in after they sit
M moves car out of way to set up dishes
C takes lid on and off a pot
C reaches and gets plate indicated
M points at pot from which C took lid
C looks at M; pours from pot on plate
C picks a spoon to stir in pot; dishes to a plate
M leans forward to hear C better
M refers to container C just picked up
C dishes from container on to plate
C pours in a cup; gives to M
M refers to something C took out of house
C takes car in front of her
C pushes dishes out of her way: M moves more
